TopicTitle: how do you build so tall

Articles.Content: im working with my laptop, how do you build tall and still attach it all? can you soom out or anything

In the latest dev-build, keyboard is also used for camera control.

* Added Keys to control the camera in the VAB (+/- for zooming, pgup/pgdown for scrolling)

* Added Keys to control the camera in flight (+/- for zooming)

You can get the latest build here: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/6995078/KSP/Core/KSP_win_0_8_5_x1.zip
